answer:
If you are eligible for a free influenza (flu) vaccine, you can get it for free from a pharmacy or from a public health clinic.  You can use our Influenza (Flu) Clinic Locator to find information on clinics in your area. 
Anyone not eligible for a free influenza vaccine can purchase it at some pharmacies and travel clinics.
Immunization Nurse
question: Can I get a free flu shot from a pharmacy if I am eligible for a free shot?
question_variation_0: can i buy free flu shot for flu shot
question_variation_2: can you get a flu shot from a pharmacy with free shot
